frame.name: Being_contained_within
frame.definition: <def-root>In this situation, a <fen>Trajector</fen> is contained inside a <fen>Landmark</fen>. This frame serves only to relate the Containing frame (with LUs such as contain.v) with the Interior_profile_relation frame (with LUs such as inside.prep).</def-root>

FE.name: Profiled_region
FE.definition: <def-root>The interior region of the <fen>Landmark</fen>, within which the <fen>Trajector</fen> is to be found.</def-root>

FE.name: Landmark
FE.definition: <def-root>The container which serves as a reference point for the <fen>Trajector</fen> which is surrounded by it.</def-root>

FE.name: Trajector
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity which is to be located with respect to the <fen>Landmark</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Trajector</fen> is contained within the <fen>Landmark</fen>.</def-root>
